name: The Heights Theater
description: The Heights Theater is a historic theater located in Houston, Texas. It offers a variety of seating configurations and ticketing options, and does not serve food but has a full bar. The venue is known for its relaxed concert etiquette and has accessible seating available. The Heights Theater is open for scheduled events only, with general hours on Thursday from 6:00 p.m. to 12:00 a.m., and Friday and Saturday from 6:00 p.m. to 2:00 a.m. Built as an Art Deco movie house in the 1920’s, The Heights Theater has been transformed to provide a state of the art audio and visual experience while retaining an aura and spirit of the past. The Moth presents the GrandSLAM, a battle of wit and words–fierce, hilarious, heartbreaking and all points between. The Moth is dedicated to finding intriguing people to tell inspired stories. At The Moth StorySLAM, those people find us. On this night, ten Houston StorySLAM winners are invited to the GrandSLAM stage for the ultimate storytelling competition.
